meanings: ham, a box of wedding gifts sent by a bridegroom to his bride before wedding

examples.korean: His face had lost its boyish roundness. 발음듣기 그의 얼굴에서는 소년 같은 둥글둥글함[통통함]이 사라지고 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
